name: Pork Tenderloin Sliders with Spicy Mango Slaw
author: Smithfield(R)
summary: Slices of roast pork tenderloin and served on slider buns with a spicy mango slaw.
ingredients: 2 teaspoons sriracha sauce, or to taste
directions: In a medium-sized bowl, toss together cabbage, mango and cilantro
Roast tenderloin in oven at 425 degrees F for 25 to 30 minutes until internal temperature reaches 150 degrees F
Remove from oven and let rest for 5 minutes then slice
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lime juice, sriracha and salt
Pour over cabbage mixture and toss to coat
To assemble the sandwiches, halve the rolls then top with a few rounds of pork and a heap of the spicy mango slaw
